product_name: Alpen Shasta Ridge 10 x 42 Waterproof Binoculars
long_description: The high-performance Alpen Shasta Ridge 10 x 42 waterproof binoculars incorporate high-quality optics to offer bright and clear viewing in almost any light and weather conditions. Roof prism design features BAK4 glass and fully multicoated optics that ensure a clear, bright view. BAK4 glass and fully multicoated optics ensure a clear, bright view. Waterproof and nitrogen-filled body helps ensure waterproof and fogproof performance; rubber armor is comfortable to grip and helps protect binoculars from bumps and drops. Long eye relief accommodates users wearing eyeglasses; eyecups lock into place with a twist. Alpen Shasta Ridge 10 x 42 waterproof binoculars come with a deluxe travel case and comfortable neck strap.
short_description: The high-performance Alpen Shasta Ridge 10 x 42 waterproof binoculars incorporate high-quality optics to offer bright and clear viewing in almost any light and weather conditions.
